description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, from the titles of Texts 1 and 2. Physical description: 25 lines per page. Written in small naskh (professional hand) in black ink with use of red. The text is framed within two red lines (faded to yellow on some leaves). European paper with watermark. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals (omits the first fol.; faulty). Leaves wanting between fol. 13 and 14. Inscription on the pastedown of the upper cover. Collation: Paper, fol. 178 ; 1¹⁰ (+1 at beginning of quire) 2¹⁰ (-4, two central bifol.) 3-17¹⁰ 18¹⁰ (+1, end of quire) ; catchword on the verso of each leaf ; the quires are numbered in red ink using Arabic numerals in the form "K 1" (see fol. 1a). Origin: Copied between 1 Muḥarram 1162 [Dec. 22, 1748] and 3 Ṣafar 1162 [Jan. 23, 1749] by al-ḥājj ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd Allāh (colophons, fol. 122a, 137a, 150a, 176a). The content and the name of a former owner seem to indicate a Syrian origin (al-Shām).
author: Nābulusī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl, 1641-1731
former_owner: Kuzbarī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad, 1770 or 1771-1845 or 1846
abstract: Collection of ten treatises by ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.
contents: 1. fol. 1a-101a : Wasāʼil al-taḥqīq wa-rasāʼil al-tawfīq / ʻAbd al-Ghanī [al-Nābulusī]. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 1588.
2. fol. 101a-103b : Taḥqīq al-maqṣūd min maʻná Yā man huwa maʻbūd fī ṣūrat kull maʻbūd / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 1431.
3. fol. 103b-112a : al-Kashf wa-al-bayān ʻammā yataʻallaqu bi-al-nisyān / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 488.
4. fol. 112b-122a : Rafʻ al-rayb ʻan ḥaḍrat al-ghayb / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 916.
5. fol. fol. 122a-(134bis)b : Kashf al-nūr ʻan aṣḥāb al-qubūr / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 484.
6. fol. 135a-137a : al-Naẓar al-mushrif fī maʻná qawl Ibn al-Fārid ʻarafta am lam taʻrif / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 839.

7. fol. 137b-141b : Risālah tataʻallaqu fī al-insān hal huwa hādhā al-haykal al-makhṣūṣ aw ghayruhu wa-bayān dhālika / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 1291.
8. fol. 141b-144b : al-Qawl al-abyan fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat Abī Madyan / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 903.
9. fol. 144b-150a : Radd al-jāhil ilá al-ṣawāb fī jawāz iḍāfat al-taʼthīr ilá al-asbāb / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 911.
10. fol. 150a-176a : Nukhbat al-masʼalah sharḥ al-Tuḥfah al-mursalah / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī. -- Mach, R. and E. Ormsby. Handlist, no. 852.
extent: 178 leaves : paper ; 193 x 144 (152 x 88) mm. bound to 208 x 150 mm.

title.@value: وسائل التحقيق ورسائل التوفيق. تحقيق المقصود من معنى "يا من هو معبود في صورة كل معبود".
Wasāʼil al-taḥqīq wa-rasāʼil al-tawfīq. Taḥqīq al-maqṣūd min maʻná "Yā man huwa maʻbūd fī ṣūrat kull maʻbūd" ... [etc.].

provenance: Bought by ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar ibn Muṣṭafá ibn Ismāʻīl ibn al-muʼallif, from al-marḥūm ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Kuzbarī, muḥaddith al-Shām, 1263 H. [1846 or 7] (fol. 1a, with seal and mention of price).
creator: Nābulusī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl, 1641-1731
نابلسي، عبد الغني بن اسماعيل
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Brown leather over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers and envelope flap. Central blind-stamped roundel on the covers. Spine and fore-edge flap repaired in red leather. Paper pastedowns. Disbound.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
